city.description: The city where the address is located.

country_code.description: The country code of the address.

id.description: The unique identifier of the address.

name.description: The name associated with the address.

provider_reference.description: Reference identifier provided by the address provider.

province.description: The province or region of the address.

street.description: The street name and number of the address.

zip.description: The postal or zip code of the address.
